name: Mass Storm Spear
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You hurl a spear of lightning at a target creature within range that you can see, who must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 3d10 lightning damage, halved on a successful saving throw.

For the duration of the spell, you can throw additional spears for 2 AP. Each time you throw a spear, you throw one more spear than the last. These additional spears can target different creatures or the same creature. A creature targeted by multiple spears takes 1d10 additional lightning damage for each spear past the first, halved on a successful saving throw.
empower: Starts at four spears instead of one.
